title: Banshee Pearls
marks: Signature, Edition, Chop Mark Signed with initials and numbered, verso: [KS 33/5
description: from a suite of 12 lithographs--.3-5,.8,.10,.11 and .1,.2,.6,.7,.9,.12 each framed together in two frames; two images of the top of a woman\'s head in profile--image at left in negative; flowerlike and knot shapes; dripping black pigment line at top of image; central organic circular image
